quantity.mainAdvice: How many do you think you'll need?

expandableSection.title: What quantity should I enter?
expandableSection.innerComponent: Estimate the quantity you think you'll need either per month or per year.

selectEstimationPeriod.mainAdvice: Over what period did you estimate the quantity?

expandableSection.title: What period should I enter?
expandableSection.innerComponent: This should be based on how you estimated the quantity you want to order.

expandableSection.title: What price should I enter?
expandableSection.innerComponent: You can change the list price if you’ve agreed a different rate with the supplier.

errorMessages.QuantityInvalid: Estimated quantity must be a whole number
errorMessages.QuantityGreaterThanZero: Estimated quantity must be greater than zero
errorMessages.QuantityLessThanMax: Maximum quantity exceeded, enter a lower estimated quantity
errorMessages.PriceMoreThan4dp: Price must be to a maximum of 4 decimal places
errorMessages.PriceLessThanMax: Maximum price exceeded, enter a lower price
errorMessages.PriceGreaterThanListPrice: You’ve entered a price that is more than the list price, enter a lower price
